entry.title: 📢 @EthereumDenver LEGO! Excited to partner with @POKTnetwork and friends to bring builders together again in Denver next month! Come for good vibes...
entry.summary:
📢 @EthereumDenver LEGO! Excited to partner with @POKTnetwork and friends to bring builders together again in Denver next month! Come for good vibes and tech alpha. Leave with friends and bespoke web3 themed Lego creations. What's not to love. Who's in? ⬇️
Pocket Network: POKT Network is excited to cohost a Builder's Lego Mixer in Denver on the 27th of Feb, 4-9pm! 🍻 Take time out from hacking and hustling to enjoy an afternoon of fireside chats with battle-tested builders and leading d/infra projects, chill out with other devs, and show off your… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1747982315374928126

entry.summary: RT DappaDan (🤙🏾,😜) The @ElectricCapital Developer Report has been released! Here are my hot takes based on the data for anyone 👇🏾 -Responsible for creating developer content - Winning developer's attention. -Growing developer ecosystems That means: - DevRel - Technical writers -Marketers -CMs

entry.title: Big chance to meet Tony in the flesh @EthereumDenver
entry.summary:
Big chance to meet Tony in the flesh @EthereumDenver
DappaDan (🤙🏾,😜): OMG Y`ALL I`M LITERALLY SHAKING!!! After years of watching on the sidelines at home, I just booked my trip to @EthereumDenver today. Can't wait to actually feel the chaotic good energy that I have heard so much about!
